programme.title: Transformers: Rise Of The Beasts
programme.sub-title: Action, Sci Fi, Fantasy, War, Drama ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: In 1994 New York City, ex-serviceman Noah Diaz accepts a job from neighbourhood chancer Reek to steal a sports car. The high-end vehicle turns out to be robot-in-disguise Mirage, who propels Noah into the midst of a hunt for a precious Transwarp key. The device will allow Autobot leader Optimus Prime and his mechanised compatriots to return home to Cybertron. programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Oscar-winning biographical drama starring Julia Roberts. When she loses a lawsuit following a car accident, unemployed single mother Erin Brockovich browbeats her lawyer, Ed Masry, into giving her a job. Soon she discovers that a power company has been dumping toxic waste and poisoning the residents of a small town. Masry's firm takes up the case - making Brockovich the unlikely linchpin in one of corporate America's biggest ever lawsuits Steven Soderbergh - Director Julia Roberts - Erin Brockovich Albert Finney - Ed Masry Aaron Eckhart - George Marg Helgenberger - Donna Jensen Cherry Jones - Pamela Duncan Peter Coyote - Kurt Potter Scotty Leavenworth - Matthew Gemmenne De La Peña - Katie Erin Brockovich-Ellis - Waitress Julia Roberts - Erin Brockovich Albert Finney - Ed Masry Aaron Eckhart - George Marg Helgenberger - Donna Jensen Cherry Jones - Pamela Duncan Peter Coyote - Kurt Potter Scotty Leavenworth - Matthew Gemmenne De La Peña - Katie Erin Brockovich-Ellis - Waitress.

programme.title: Watchmen
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, Sci Fi, Thriller, Mystery ║ 2009 ║ 18
programme.desc: Adaptation of Alan Moore and Dave Gibbons's superhero graphic novel, starring Billy Crudup, Patrick Wilson and Jackie Earle Haley. In an alternative 1985, America is on the brink of nuclear war with Russia and costumed superheroes have been outlawed, forcing most into retirement. programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on Dan Brown's forerunner to The Da Vinci Code, starring Tom Hanks and Ayelet Zurer. With the election of a new pope imminent, the Illuminati kidnap the four leading contenders and issue a coded message that they will murder the men and blow up the Vatican. programme.desc: Classic horror starring Tippi Hedren and Rod Taylor. A chance meeting in a San Francisco pet shop impels wealthy playgirl Melanie Daniels to track down lawyer Mitch Brenner at his mother's home in Bodega Bay, 70 miles away. As a gift, she takes a pair of lovebirds with her. programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins, Helena Bonham Carter and Johnny Flynn. In 1938, young British stockbroker Nicholas Winton visits Prague and becomes involved in an audacious plan to evacuate hundreds of Jewish children before the Nazis close the borders. programme.title: Freud's Last Session
programme.desc: Period drama starring Anthony Hopkins and Matthew Goode. As war breaks out in Europe in September 1939, ailing psychoanalyst Sigmund Freud welcomes author CS Lewis to his London home. An exchange of ideas follows, in which the two discuss parenthood, sex, combat trauma and a bugbear of Freud's: Lewis's rejection of atheism and embrace of Christianity Matt Brown - Director Anthony Hopkins - Sigmund Freud Matthew Goode - CS Lewis Liv Lisa Fries - Anna Freud Jodi Balfour - Dorothy Burlingham Jeremy Northam - Ernest Jones Orla Brady - Janie Moore Anthony Hopkins - Sigmund Freud Matthew Goode - CS Lewis Liv Lisa Fries - Anna Freud Jodi Balfour - Dorothy Burlingham Jeremy Northam - Ernest Jones Orla Brady - Janie Moore.

programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Shaadi Mein Zaroor Aana
programme.desc: Jyotica Tangri won theBest Female Playback Singer in Zee Cine Awards.

programme.title: Socha Na Tha
programme.desc: (2005) Viren can't imagine having an arranged marriage. His parents want him to meet Aditi. They refuse to get married but stay friends. Will Cupid strike and change their minds?

programme.title: Lal Baadshah
programme.desc: (1999) K. C. Bokadia directs Amitabh Bachchan as Lal Baadshah in this action film where he plays the role of a messiah and clashes against the deadly Dhayal Singh (Amrish Puri).

programme.title: Mohra
programme.desc: Chinni Prakash won the Filmfare award for 'Best Choreography' in 1995.

programme.title: Kaala Sona
programme.desc: Rakesh's father was killed years ago. His killer died too... or so Rakesh thought. But when he finds out that the killer is alive ahd the file closed he decides to avenge his father's murder himself.

programme.title: Dabangg 3
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Saiee Manjrekar won the 'Highest Grossing Debut Actress' award and Prabhu Deva won the 'The 100 Crore Club' award at the ETC Bollywood Business Awards 2020.

programme.title: Parmanu: The Story Of Pokhran
programme.desc: A look at India's second confidential nuclear test series at Pokhran led by Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam, during the time of PM Atal Bihari Vajpayee's tenure.

programme.title: Gadar... Ek Prem Katha
programme.desc: The film was declared an 'All-Time Blockbuster' by Box Office and won many awards including 'Best Actor, Best Actress, Best Story, Best Director, Best actor in a negative role'.

programme.title: Ghayal
programme.desc: Sunny Deol won the National Award as best actor for this film, also praised with the national award for the best film of the year.

programme.title: Paying Guests
programme.desc: Four friends, who are unemployed, finally find a place to stay but on the condition that they need to be married. Chaos ensues when they decide to pose as couples.

programme.title: Aap To Aise Na The
programme.desc: Vijay, who owns a furniture store, is in love with Varsha. However, Vijay's life takes a drastic turn when she decides to marry his friend Vikram, a rich man, who promises her a better life.

programme.title: Awaara
programme.desc: A misunderstanding forces Judge Raghunath to disown his wife. She starts living in the slums, and has a baby boy. Her son, Raj grows up & becomes a criminal - his destiny - to confront his father.

programme.title: Teri Bhabhi Hai Pagle
programme.desc: Dev, an assistant director, dreams of independently directing a film and manages to convince Raj, a superstar, to produce his film. However, chaos ensues as the shooting commences.

programme.title: Skanda
programme.desc: (Saturday Superhits) The prodigal son of a respected leader takes on two political rivals and forms bonds with their daughters in this Telugu-language action drama.

programme.title: Pipa
programme.desc: Balram Singh Mehta steps up to prove his worth by fighting on the eastern front during the Indo-Pakistani war of 1971.

programme.title: Kaho Naa Pyar Hai
programme.desc: The movie was the highest-grossing Bollywood film of 2000 and won several awards including 'Best Film, Best Actor, Best Debut Actor, Best Director, Best Singer - Male/Female.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Jurm
programme.desc: Avinash (Bobby Deol) is arrested for the murder of his wife Sanjana (Lara Dutta). He entrusts his defence to his friend Rohit (Milind Soman). But who really killed Sanjana?

programme.title: Chameli Ki Shaadi
programme.desc: (1986) A hilarious movie about a small-town romance. Stars Anil Kapoor, Amrita Singh, Amjad Khan, Annu Kapoor and Pankaj Kapoor. Directed by Basu Chatterjee. Music by Kalyanji Anandji.

programme.title: Mr India
programme.desc: The film won many accolades, at the first Star and Style - Lux Awards - best Film (Boney Kapoor), best director (Shekhar Kapur), best actor (Anil Kapoor), and best actress (Sridevi).

programme.title: Surakksha
programme.desc: Officer Gopi (Mithun) aka Gunmaster G9 is called to investigate against an organisation which intends to spread terror in India.

programme.title: Khichdi 2
programme.desc: When an intelligence services agent discovers that Praful resembles the king of Paanthukistan, he enlists the help of the Parekh family to place Praful in the king's position and save his subjects.

programme.title: Kakuda
programme.desc: (UK TV Premiere) After Sunny, an ordinary boy, gets kicked by the ghost that has cursed his town, his lover decides to seek the help of a ghost hunter.

programme.title: Madgaon Express
programme.desc: Childhood friends Dodo, Ayush and Pinku embark on a trip to Goa that goes completely off-track due to a sequence of terrible decisions.

programme.title: Nanu Ki Jaanu
programme.desc: (2018) Nanu, a land mafia agent, tries to rescue a woman who met with an accident. The woman, however, dies but her ghost arrives in Nanu's apartment.

programme.title: Nanu Ki Jaanu
programme.desc: (2018) Nanu, a land mafia agent, tries to rescue a woman who met with an accident. The woman, however, dies but her ghost arrives in Nanu's apartment.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Laadla
programme.desc: Raj (Anil Kapoor) is a union leader with considerable clout over the workers. He marries the factory's owner Sheetal (Sridevi), little knowing that she is his biggest enemy.

programme.title: Pyar Mein Twist
programme.desc: Sheetal Arya (Dimple Kapadia) and Yash Khurana (Rishi Kapoor) fall in love and decide to live together. But their grown-up kids find their relationship hard to understand.

programme.title: Love
programme.desc: (1991) Jailed as a child, Prithvi (Salman Khan) grows to be aggressive, but Maggie (Revathi) changes him. However, tragedies await both of them. Will their love rise above it?

programme.title: Aitraaz
programme.desc: Priyanka Chopra praised with the best negtive role for this movie.

programme.title: Gold
programme.desc: This Movie has won many awards for the different categories like Highest Grossing Debut Actress, Rising Film Star From Television, Best Male Playback Singer.

programme.title: Army
programme.desc: (Movie@6) A 1994 film about Geeta (Sridevi) who, with a group of young lads, seeks revenge from the dreaded gangster Nagraj (Danny Denzongpa) for killing her husband Arjun (Shahrukh Khan).

programme.title: Dono
programme.desc: (Prime Time Movie) Dev travels to Thailand to attend his best friend's wedding and begins to form a bond with Meghna, who is the friend of the groom.

programme.title: Code Name: Tiranga
programme.desc: Tasked with capturing a wanted criminal, an undercover spy sets out on a perilous mission. However, things become complicated when her heart is pulled into it.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Namaste England
programme.desc: Param and Jasmeet's relationship undergoes stress and changes as they struggle to fulfil their dreams of relocating to England. Staring Arjun Kapoor and Parineeti Chopra.

programme.title: Buddha Mar Gaya
programme.desc: A rich industrialist pops it just before the Ipo of his company - the family must now conceal his death till all the shares are sold.

programme.title: Chaalbaaz
programme.desc: Sridevi was declared best actress and Saroj Khan was declared best choreographer at the Filmfare Awards 1990.

programme.title: Salaam-E-Ishq
programme.desc: Six couples face problems in their lives when fate forces them to move away from each other. They must overcome these issues in order to make their love triumph.

programme.title: Acharya
programme.desc: Enraged by the murders committed by the municipal leader of Dharmasthali, Acharya, a social reformer, vows to take revenge for his friend, Siddha. Fights and corruption ensue as secrets get revealed.

programme.title: Koyla
programme.desc: (Movie @6) A woman who was tricked into marriage falls in love with her evil husband's mute servant, and is locked in a room while her husband tries to get rid of her lover.

programme.title: Ram Teri Ganga Maili
programme.desc: The film won several awards including 'Best Film' at the Filmfare Awards 1986. Lata Mangeshkar and Suresh Wadkar won the Bengal Film Journalists' Award 1986 for 'Best Singer'.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Teri Meri Kahaani
programme.desc: (2012) The story takes us through a journey of eternal love between a couple who have vowed to love each other not only in this life but in every life to follow.

programme.title: Turtle
programme.desc: In a drought-struck village in Rajasthan, Ramkaran Choudhary churns the parched earth to extract water while the villagers indulge in a tug of war in desperation as they seek to quench their thirst.

programme.title: Prem Kahani
programme.desc: Rajesh leads a quiet life with his girlfriend Kamini. His life changes when his brother is killed during the freedom struggle at the hands of the British. Rajesh gets involved in the independence str.

programme.title: Chori Chori Chupke Chupke
programme.desc: Madhu, a prostitute who agrees to have Raj's baby, for money. Everything changes when she develops feelings for the baby and Raj. Starring Salman Khan, Rani Mukerji and Preity Zinta.

programme.title: Hum Aapke Hain Kaun
programme.desc: The film was praised and won several awards including 'Best Popular Film Providing Wholesome Entertainment' at the National Film Awards, India 1995.

programme.title: Pardes
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Alka Yagnik won the 'Best Singer - Female' award, Mahima Chaudhry won the 'Best Debut Actress' award and Subhash Ghai won the 'Best Screenplay' at the Filmfare Awards 1998.

programme.title: Shubh Mangal Saavdhan
programme.desc: At the Awards of the International Indian Film Academy 2018, the film was awarded for the 'Best Actress in a Leading Role, Best Actress in a Supporting Role and Best Dialogues'.

programme.title: Velle
programme.desc: Three criminals, a runaway girl, her three best friends, an aspiring director and a star cross path due to an incident. Will they come off better for it or worse?

programme.desc: Ayananka Bose won an award for the 'Best Cinematography' at the Zee Cine Awards 2011.

programme.title: Mere Pyaare Prime Minister
programme.desc: This movie won Best International Film award in Academy of Science Fiction, Fantasy and Horror Films, USA.

programme.title: Shirdi Ke Sai Baba

programme.title: Dil Chahta Hai
programme.desc: The film was praised and won many awards in many categories like 'Best actor, Best Comic Award, Best Film, Best Director, Best story, Best Lyrics, Best Singer'.

programme.title: Hum Saath Saath Hain
programme.desc: Jayanti Shevale won an award for 'Best Make Up' at the Awards of the International Indian Film Academy 2000.

programme.title: Karan Arjun

programme.desc: The series depicts the life of Desho, whose life turns upside down on discovering her husband Armaans illicit relationship with Simple.

programme.title: Freud's Last Session
programme.desc: Period drama starring Anthony Hopkins and Matthew Goode. As war breaks out in Europe in September 1939, ailing psychoanalyst Sigmund Freud welcomes author CS Lewis to his London home.
